rentals.licenseTitle: Do I Need a Boat License in Mallorca?
rentals.licenseText: In Spain, boats over 6 meters in length or with engines exceeding 15 horsepower require a valid nautical license. The most commonly accepted international qualification is the ICC (International Certificate of Competence). For smaller boats and watercraft below these limits, no license is needed. Our matching service only connects you with providers who clearly communicate licensing requirements and ensure full compliance.
